attributes.action: stop ghandi statue erection in leicester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ghandi has no roots to do with Leicester, if the statue were to be put up i believe that it shouldn't be the peoples money of whom it shall not benefit. If there is a statue to be put up, the community assossiated with Ghandi should put up the money. I think that the money could be distributed in other ways that will be more constructive for the whole community of Leicester rather than just a selection of it's population.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gandhi/
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
